member.name: ID2D1SvgPointCollection.GetPoints
member.summary: Gets points from the points array.
member.param: The element count of the buffer.
The index of the first point to retrieve.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPointCollection.GetPointsCount
member.summary: Gets the number of points in the array.
member.returns: Returns the number of points in the array.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPointCollection.RemovePointsAtEnd
member.summary: Removes points from the end of the array.
member.param: Specifies how many points to remove.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPointCollection.UpdatePoints
member.summary: Updates the points array. Existing points not updated by this method are preserved. The array is resized larger if necessary to accommodate the new points.
member.param: The number of points to update.
The index at which to begin updating points. Must be less than or equal to the size of the array.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPointCollection
member.summary: Interface describing an SVG points value in a polyline or polygon element.
